Class ModifyCustomerFormController

extends java.lang.Object
    The controller class for the modify customer form

    • Method Detail

      • modifyCustomer

        void modifyCustomer​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
             throws java.io.IOException

        This method retrieves the values from the text fields and combo boxes and sets them as the customer's new attributes. The customers form is then displayed.

        Parameters:
        event - When the save button is pressed
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - Exception thrown if the customers form fxml cannot be located

      • returnCustomerForm

        void returnCustomerForm​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
                 throws java.io.IOException

        This method changes the scene and displays the customers form.

        Parameters:
        event - When the cancel button is pressed
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - Exception thrown if the customers form cannot be located

      • initializeCustomerData

        public void initializeCustomerData​(Customer customer)
                            throws java.sql.SQLException

        This method initializes the text fields and combo boxes with the customer's attributes. Then a lambda expression is used to change the first level division combo box's selection based on the item selected from the country combo box. The lambda expression keeps the logic of the behavior of the combo boxes in the appropriate method without having to create a separate function.

        Parameters:
        customer - Selected customer from the customers form
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - Exception thrown if there is an error accessing the database
